name: Dungeon Shopkeeper (fods)
description:
The objective of this game is to increase the Storage and Gold per Sale to the highest level you can.  You can do this by pressing the button on the bottom right side of the screen.
The levels aren't capped but changes to the customer speed/customer spawn speed will stop changing by Storage Space: 20.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is my first ever "finished game" for Trijam #181 even though I went a bit above 3 hours.

Unfortunately it doesn't have any sound, as I'm still figuring those bits out.

I'm pretty sure you can break this game easily, with the right amount of patience and effort.

Enjoy!

Assets used:

16x16 Dungeon Tileset by 0x72
Lou Bagel Fonts by Lou Bagel

Made with Construct 3.
